John Ramey Statistics and Machine Learning

Publications/Technical Reports

  • Finak, G., Frelinger J., Jiang, W., Newell, E., Ramey, J., Davis, M., Kalams, S., de Rosa, S., and Gottardo, R. (2014) OpenCyto: An Open Source Infrastructure for Scalable, Robust, Reproducible, and Automated, End-to-End Flow Cytometry Data Analysis, PLOS Computational Biology, 10, 8.

  • Ramey, J. A. (2013). An Overview of Mixture Discriminant Analysis. Technical Report.

  • Ramey, J. A. and Young, P. D. (2013). A Comparison of Regularization Methods Applied to the Linear Discriminant Function with High-Dimensional Microarray Data, Journal of Statistical Computation and Simulation, 83, 3, 581-596.

  • McDermott, J., Wang, J., Mitchell, H., Webb-Robertson, B., Hafen, R., Ramey, J., and Rodland, K. (2013) Challenges in Biomarker Discovery: Combining Expert Insights with Statistical Analysis of Complex Omics Data, Expert Opinion on Medical Diagnostics, 7, 1, 37-51.
